english_example_sentence: If we had not remained in the small town, we would have discovered exciting opportunities
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы не остались в маленьком городе, мы бы открыли захватывающие возможности
turkish_example_sentence: Biz küçük kasabada kalmamışsak, heyecan verici fırsatları keşfedebilirdik
